item.title: Allotment, Ahoy!
item.description: Allotment news Itâ€™s official: I am now renting an allotment! I went for a look on Saturday and was told a quarter plot was rough 8 x 8 m2. I also had a choice, which was nice. Plot was chosen: I was tempted to take the plot with lots of raspberry canes, but decided against it because there was more work than the other one. Here are some pictures of the plot!
